cow.translation[0].definitions[0].defini: a large female animal that is kept on farms and used to produce milk or meat
cow.translation[0].definitions[1].defini: a male or female animal of this type
cow.translation[0].definitions[2].defini: the female of some large animals, such as the elephant or the whale
cow.translation[0].definitions[3].defini: an offensive word for a woman who you think is stupid or unpleasant
cow.translation[0].note_box[0].sections[: He keeps a herd of dairy cows.
They are a well-known breed of beef cow.
Once a day, the cows are brought in to be milked.
I could hear cows mooing in the barn.
Cows were grazing peacefully in the meadows.
At this time of year the cows are calving.
We had to wait while a farmer brought a herd of cows across the bridge.
cow.translation[1].definitions[0].defini: to frighten someone in order to make them do something
cow.translation[1].definitions[0].exampl: The protesters had been cowed into submission by the police.
